oai_dc:dc.dc:source: [Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of the collection of published and unpublished documents about Lesotho and the Free State gathered by George McCall Theal in several volumes. Only the first three volumes were published, this is volume 3.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fhya-depot
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Basutoland Records. Copies of Official Documents of Various Kinds, Account of Travellers, &c., Collected and Arranged by Order of the Honourable J. W. Sauer, Esq., Secretary for Native Affairs, by GEO. M. Theal, First Clerck in the Native Affairs Department. With Maps and Sketches of Boundary Lines. Volume III. 1862-1868
